Searching.description:
Here's an Original Mashup of my collab w/ Blinders "Always" with vocals from Walk The Moon's "Shut Up And Dance." It's one of many tracks off my new remix/mashup compilation called Dance Floor Filth 5, available on 3lau.com/music for FREE

Here's the EXTENDED MIX: bit.ly/alwaysdancext

Hope you like it! - J
Searching.title: 3LAU vs Walk The Moon
